name: Escape Room (itch) (CooperFryar, Adriana Gonzales, Kevin Benavides, Crimzen, zoeohhh, schwizzlers)
name_original: Escape Room (itch) (CooperFryar, Adriana Gonzales, Kevin Benavides, Crimzen, zoeohhh, schwizzlers)
description:
Overview
Explore the oil rig while trying to transmit data to the mainland.  Find the pin code to unlock the fuse box. Decipher the clues to find the missing fuses, and restore power to the facility.  

Team Members
Cooper Fryar - Designer
Zoe Orgish - Producer
Matthew Umana - Scripter
Olivia Schweers - Artist
Randy Points - Audio
Adriana Gonzales - Artist
Kevin Benavides - Scripter

Mechanics/Obstacles
Obtainable items, passcode menu, breaker box with fuses, basic player movement, inventory, breaker box menu

Puzzle Details
Find the fuse box and its missing fuses to turn the power back on.  

How to Play 
Use WASD to move and the mouse to adjust the camera.  The black point in the center is where your mouse cursor is, and you can click to pick up items or open/close doors. You can use Tab to view your inventory. Press Esc to close out of the breaker menu. To quit the game on Mac, press Cmd + Q. To quit the game on Windows, press Alt + F4.
